summary: Two killers are living in our town An ordinary small town is terrorized when local women are found brutally murdered and 'crucified' in public places. Gyeong-joo, a struggling novelist, ... See full summary »
cast: Soo-hwan Jeon|Ha-ram Kim|Da-mi Ko|Sun-kyun Lee|Oh Man-Seok|Hong-jin Mo|Deok-Hwan Ryu
title: Woo-ri-dong-ne
